sections.text:
The assent of the General Assembly required by "An Act to Promote the Conservation and Profitable Use of Agricultural Land Resources by Temporary Federal Aid to Farmers and by Providing for a Permanent Policy of Federal Aid to States for Such Purposes," (Public No. 461, 74th Congress), approved by the President, February 29, 1936, is given to the provisions and requirements of that act.

HISTORY: 1962 Code Section 63-1; 1952 Code Section 63-1; 1942 Code Section 5806-3; 1936 (39) 1531.
